content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Automation Science Pack Production Line (around position 8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5) containing iron gear wheels
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5) moving items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine-1 at (8.5, 13.5) crafting automation science packs
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5) moving finished products
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)

### Iron Plate Production Line 1 (around position -27.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0) mining iron ore
- Output chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0) smelting iron plates
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Iron Plate Production Line 2 (around position -17.0, -51.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Output chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Coal Mining Setup (around position 41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0) mining coal
- Output chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation System (around position -4.5, 16.0)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5) pumping water
- Pipe network connecting water supply
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0) generating steam
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5) generating electricity
- Connected electrical network powering various machines

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in chest before attempting extraction
- Check chest inventory contents before attempting to extract items
- Consider implementing better inventory tracking to avoid attempting extraction of non-existent items

### Resource shortage errors in assembling machine
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Monitor ingredient levels and replenish before they run out
- Current example: Missing copper plates for automation science pack production

### Fuel management errors
- Keep mining drills fueled to prevent work stoppage
- Implement regular fuel checking and replenishment routines
- Monitor fuel levels in all burner-type entities

### Entity status monitoring
- Pay attention to warning messages from entities
- Address "waiting for source items" warnings by ensuring proper supply chain
- Monitor "no ingredients" warnings in furnaces and assemblers
